review: I don't think it free tv you  still need  dish
author: smoises

review: I enjoy watching apps on the fire stick. Sometimes the reception is bad and Amazon charges for everything on the system. The free shows have commercials which is stupid but advertising is everywhere so.... I like the karaoke but sometimes I just want to listen to the song so I need to figure out how to get the words off. Overall three stars!
author: LATAMIRA

review: My family loves the fire stick.. Works so well
author: Dominique Kinsler

review: Fast set-up and easy to use. Remote is very basic -- maybe feels a little flimsy but easy to figure out. For $34, this is an amazing extension of the value of Prime membership and we're really enjoying it.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Have not used it enough yet to reach it's potential, but so far we Love it!
author: Baker Scott

review: Really great product! Enjoy every minute of it, but it would be even better if they did a major update to the Twitch app. I'd like to be able to search for streamers and be able to login to my account.
author: Whitley Porter

review: We tried it on 3 tv's with no luck. Amazon sent us another one at that one worked on one TV for one day.
author: Cheri Core
